resources.string: You will soon enter the page of button game as the final step of testings, once you click the button start fo go to the other screen. In the game page, there will be 5 buttons for you to click on according to the number presented on their bodies. All numbers are randomly generated, please select the smallest numbered button first, then selecting the rest in ascending order. Once you finish clicking all the buttons for once, the game will be ended, the accuracy and speed of your moves will add into our scoring system to determine how drunk you are.
